definition[0]: the flat cutting part of a tool or weapon
example[1]: The blade of the knife flashed in the moonlight.
definition[1]: the flat wide part of an object that pushes against air or water
definition[2]: the metal part on the bottom of an ice-skate
definition[3]: a thin curved piece of a strong material that someone with the lower part of their leg missing attaches to their leg in order to run
